title: Power BI Update - October 2021
excerpt: Welcome to the October 2021 update. Leaves fall, Power BI calls; and we are excited to release additional functionality for DirectQuery, improvements for the SWITCH function, and new Biwise DAX functions. There is more to explore, please continue to read on.  Follow us on Twitter - https://twitter.com/mspowerbi
